\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 93310}

\subsection*{Life..... It Ain't That Bad}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{peacelovedrug}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2 mg & oral & Pharms - Alprazolam & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 104.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I was initially prescribed Xanax 1 mg for anxiety/panic attacks by my doctor. (My dose has increased since then) 1 mg worked good for quite a while, but one day I was so upset \& stressed out I decided to take 2 mg\ldots . and WOW! I was just so relaxed \& chilled out. Everything around me was peaceful, and the horrible depression I feel each \& every day just lifted for the time being\ldots . 



Somedays when I'm so depressed \& feel like I can't stand being here for another minute even.. I take my Xanax (which kicks in fairly quickly) \& suddenly find myself thinking - `life\ldots . it aint that bad' It actually helps to be more productive \& creative as well. Kinda of weird, but thought I'd throw it in there.

\end{document}
